topic.title: Interlaken Lanes Tx to Rx Loopback

body.p: The Interlaken blocks provide an internal Tx to Rx loopback. The data in the fabric ingress direction is looped back in the Interlaken block toward the DCPB. The data is fully processed into Interlaken lanes and each of these lanes is looped back. The data may also be sent by the Interlaken block on the transmit interface. The in-band flow control information is embedded in the Interlaken data in the burst control words and is therefore automatically looped back with the data. The flow control loopback allows the receive side to throttle the transmitter. This prevents receiver overflows and allows the Interlaken Internal data loopback to work successfully.
